Reference

All functions

filter_route_id()

Filter GTFS data by route ids

filter_route_type()

Filter GTFS data by route type (transport mode)

filter_trip_id()

Filter GTFS data by trip_id

get_parent_station()

Get parent stations recursively

get_trip_duration()

Get trip duration

get_trip_geometry()

Get trip geometry

get_trip_segment_duration()

Get trip segments' duration

get_trip_speed()

Get trip speed

gtfstools

gtfstools: General Transit Feed Specification (GTFS) Editing and Analysing Tools

merge_gtfs()

Merge GTFS files

read_gtfs()

Read and validate GTFS files

set_trip_speed()

Set trip average speed

validate_gtfs()

Validate GTFS file

write_gtfs()
